thumb.name: Get Nostalgic! Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3EInvitation Instructions:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E1. To personalize and print this project, click on the preview image to the left to open the workspace.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E2. Personalize the text and graphics. Select the text to change it or its size, color, and font. Even add digital photos!%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E3. Click on the Print button, select the number of copies you'd like to print and go!. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cb%3ETips:%3C/b%3E Print your invitations on plain paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E

thumb.name: Birthday Celebration Borderless
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's all about%3Cbr%3ETara!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWe invite you%3Cbr%3Eand a guest%3Cbr%3Eto attend%3Cbr%3Ea birthday celebration.%3Cbr%3EEnjoy the festivities%3Cbr%3Ewith lots of food.%3Cbr%3Eprizes. games%3Cbr%3Eand surprises!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Shake a Tail Borderless
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EShake a tail...%3Cbr%3Espin around...%3Cbr%3ELet's dance!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHey. we're having%3Cbr%3Ea get together!%3Cbr%3ESwing on by%3Cbr%3Eand let's eat. dance%3Cbr%3Eand party 'til the sun rises.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESee ya then!%3Cbr%3E
